I work in a tall building on a busy street.
My favorite part of the building is the cafe downstairs.
You can work there with a good view while drinking coffee.
I work in a building with just a few floors.
It is not high, but it has a very modern design inside.
There are a lot of open spaces, so it is comfortable to move around.
My favorite part of the office is the common space.
There are different chairs and tables for everyone to sit, work, and talk.
There is also a garden in the middle of the building.
There are tables and chairs there where you can work.
